DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety/tolerability pharmacokinetics combination gemigliptin 50mg metformin HCl extend release 1000mg comparison component administer healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: BE Study Combinations Gemigliptin 50mg Metformin HCl Extended Release 1000mg Comparison Each Component Administered Alone .
